TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 從 Microsoft Ajax 角色服務取得 Windows 架構應用程式的角色資訊。

span.span: Gets role information for Windows-based applications from an Microsoft Ajax roles service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用用戶端應用程式服務來擷取現有的角色服務中的角色資訊，藉由設定應用程式以使用類別。You can use client application services to retrieve role information from an existing roles service by configuring your application to use the class. 設定之後，您可以判斷已驗證的使用者是否具有特定角色中，藉由呼叫方法由`static`屬性。After configuration, you can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the method of the returned by the `static` property. 針對設定為使用用戶端應用程式服務的應用程式，這個屬性會傳回 。For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a . 因為這個類別會實作 介面，所以您不需要明確地參考它。Because this class implements the interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly. 方法會在內部呼叫方法。The method internally calls the method. 類別是唯讀的角色成員資格提供者所指定的角色服務從擷取角色資訊已驗證的使用者屬性。The class is a read-only role membership provider that retrieves role information for authenticated users from the roles service indicated by the property. 值屬性通常擷取自應用程式組態檔，以及其他組態值。The value of the property is typically retrieved from the application configuration file along with other configuration values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 您可以擷取目前執行個體透過`static`屬性。You can retrieve the current instance through the `static` property. 類別僅支援並方法抽象類別。The class supports only the and methods of the abstract class. 當您呼叫這些方法的其中一個特定的使用者時，服務提供者會先檢查本機資料快取，如角色資訊。When you call one of these methods for a particular user, the service provider first checks the local data cache for role information. 如果快取不包含任何角色資訊，或已過期的快取，服務提供者角色服務從擷取角色資訊，並將它新增至快取。If the cache does not contain any role information or the cache has expired, the service provider retrieves the role information from the roles service and adds it to the cache. 當您設定用戶端應用程式服務時，您可以指定角色快取的逾時期限。You can specify the time-out period for the roles cache when you configure client application services. 若要強制方法來擷取而不是本機快取中，呼叫服務的角色資料方法第一次。To force the method to retrieve role data from the service instead of the local cache, call the method first. 您無法使用類別來建立或刪除角色，或修改使用者角色成員資格。You cannot use the class to create or delete roles, or to modify the role membership of users. 若要建立或修改角色資訊，您必須變更伺服器上的角色服務的組態。To create or modify role information, you must change the configuration of the role service on the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式設定服務位置的角色。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the roles service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#302)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#302)]

related.span: 如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務

MemberSignature.Value: public override string[] GetRolesForUser (string username);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string[] GetRolesForUser(string username) cil managed

param.name: username
param.span: 要擷取其角色的使用者名稱。

span.span: The name of the user to retrieve roles for.

summary.span: 取得指定之使用者所屬的角色名稱。

span.span: Gets the names of the roles that the specified user belongs to.

returns.span: 所屬的角色名稱，或未驗證使用者時則為空陣列。

span.span: The role names that belongs to or an empty array if the user is not authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取針對目前已經過驗證的使用者，您必須在中指定的角色資訊`username`參數。The method retrieves role information for the current, authenticated user, which you must specify in the `username` parameter. 您可以透過取得使用者名稱`static`屬性，如下所示： `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`。You can get the user name through the `static` property as follows: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`. 服務提供者會快取本機檔案系統，以避免不必要的服務呼叫的角色資訊。The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用此方法來判斷使用者登入是否已過期之前測試的角色成員資格。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to determine whether the user login has expired before testing role membership. 此程式碼會假設所有有效的使用者與一或多個角色都是相關聯。This code assumes that all valid users are associated with one or more roles. 在此情況下，方法將不會傳回任何先前已驗證的使用者，其登入已過期的角色。In this case, the method will not return any roles for a previously-authenticated user whose login has expired. 如果使用者登入已過期，這個程式碼會顯示 [登入] 對話方塊。If the user login has expired, this code displays the login dialog box. 否則，它會呼叫方法，以判斷使用者是否為"manager"角色。Otherwise, it calls the method to determine whether the user is in the "manager" role. 受限制的程式碼位於`PerformManagerTask`方法，則不會提供。The restricted code is in a `PerformManagerTask` method, which is not provided. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#321)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#321)]

exception.span: 不是目前已驗證之使用者的使用者名稱。

span.span: is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.

span.span: A collection of name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]擴充性模型呼叫方法來初始化使用應用程式組態檔中的資訊。The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the using information in your application configuration file. 這個方法會辨識下列角色服務的組態屬性：This method recognizes the following role service configuration attributes: - `name` - `description` - `cacheTimeout` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` - `honorCookieExpiry` 如需有關這些屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information about these attributes, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

exception.span: 包含 cacheTimeout 值，該值並未使用可轉換為 值的正確格式。

span.span: contains a cacheTimeout value that is not in the correct format for conversion to an value.

exception.span: 包含 cacheTimeout 值，該值代表小於 或大於 的數目。

span.span: contains a cacheTimeout value that represents a number less than or greater than .

summary.span: 取得值，指出指定使用者是否在指定的角色中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified user is in the specified role.

returns.span: 如果指定的使用者是在指定的角色中，則為 ；如果指定的使用者未經過驗證或未在指定的角色中，則為 。

span.span: if the specified user is in the specified role; if the specified user is not authenticated or is not in the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以判斷已驗證的使用者是否具有特定角色中，藉由呼叫方法由`static`屬性。You can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the method of the returned by the `static` property. 針對設定為使用用戶端應用程式服務的應用程式，這個屬性會傳回 。For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a . 因為這個類別會實作 介面，所以您不需要明確地參考它。Because this class implements the interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly. 方法會在內部呼叫方法。The method internally calls the method. 方法會使用方法，以判斷使用者是否已由`username`中指定之角色`roleName`。The method uses the method to determine whether the user indicated by `username` is in the role indicated by `roleName`. 服務提供者會快取本機檔案系統，以避免不必要的服務呼叫的角色資訊。The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取此方法直接以判斷使用者是否為特定的角色。The following example code demonstrates how to access this method directly to determine whether the user is in a particular role. 此程式碼會先測試是否已過期的使用者登入。This code first tests whether the user login has expired. 明確參考，才能呼叫方法，所以相同的參考用來呼叫方法。An explicit reference is required to call the method, so the same reference is used to call the method. 如果使用者是 「 管理員 」 角色中，此程式碼會呼叫`PerformManagerTask`方法，則不會提供。If the user is in the "manager" role, this code calls a `PerformManagerTask` method, which is not provided. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#321)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#321)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResetCache ();
.method public hidebysig instance void ResetCache() cil managed
Public Sub ResetCache ()
public: void ResetCache();
member this.ResetCache : unit -> unit

summary.span: 清除快取的角色資訊並重設快取逾時期間。

span.span: Clears the cached role information and resets the cache time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從本機快取移除所有的角色資訊，並會導致要到期的快取。The method removes all role information from the local cache and causes the cache to expire. 呼叫這個方法之後，您下次呼叫或方法會擷取已設定的角色服務，而不是本機快取的角色資訊。After you call this method, your next call to the or method will retrieve role information from the configured role service instead of the local cache. 若要啟用其角色已變更，但尚未過期的快取時，請重新整理角色快取的使用者，您可以使用這個方法。You can use this method to enable users to refresh the roles cache when their role has changed but the cache has not yet expired. 如需如何設定角色快取逾時間隔的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For information about how to set the roles cache time-out interval, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來重設本機角色快取。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to reset the local roles cache. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#314](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#314)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#314](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#314)]

related.span: 如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務

span.span: How to: Configure Client Application Services

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定角色服務的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the role service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性儲存在您的應用程式程式碼，但是通常會設定應用程式組態檔中的值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 這可讓您不需要重新編譯您的程式碼變更的服務位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 當您以程式設計方式設定服務位置時，您必須指定完整服務最後一定會使用 「 Role_JSON_AppService.axd"的 URI。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Role_JSON_AppService.axd". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式設定服務位置的角色。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the roles service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#302)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#302)]

exception.span: 當取得這個屬性時，在應用程式組態檔中找不到服務 URI，且這個屬性先前並未設定過。

span.span: When getting this property, no service URI was found in the application configuration file, and this property has not been previously set.

related.span: 如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務

span.span: How to: Configure Client Application Services
